option.name: originalContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: api-gateway security: oauth2: resourceserver: jwt: jwk-set-uri: http://${KEY_CLOAK_HOST:localhost}:${KEY_CLOAK_PORT:8181}/realms/fitness-oauth2/protocol/openid-connect/certs
logging: level: org.springframework.security: DEBUG com.fitness.gateway: DEBUG cloud: gateway: routes: - id: user-service uri: lb://USER-SERVICE predicates: - Path=/api/users/**
- id: activity-service uri: lb://ACTIVITY-SERVICE predicates: - Path=/api/activities/**
- id: ai-service uri: lb://AI-SERVICE predicates: - Path=/api/recommendations/**
server: port: 8085
eureka: client: serviceUrl: defaultZone: http://${EUREKA_HOST:localhost}:${EUREKA_PORT:8761}/eureka/
